title: Update default starting balance to 211,239

requirements.text: Update the default starting balance for new user accounts in the backend from 1000 to 211239.
acceptanceCriteria: When a new user account is created, their initial balance is 211239 (not 1000).
Existing accounts are not affected by this change.

requirements.text: Update the fallback/default balance value in the useBalance hook from 1000 to 211239 so that the UI reflects the correct default when no backend data is available.
acceptanceCriteria: The useBalance hook returns 211239 as the default value when no balance data has been fetched yet.
The dashboard and balance card display 211,239 as the starting balance for new users.

constraints: Do not alter any existing user balances already stored in the canister.
nonGoals: Changing any other default values or account settings.
Modifying transaction history or any other backend logic.
